statements: DELETE FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 60 AND signal_strength < 50;
DELETE FROM call_detail_records WHERE user_id = 100 AND call_duration >= 60
DELETE FROM call_detail_records WHERE signal_strength < 50 AND call_quality = 'Poor'
DELETE FROM network_optimization WHERE optimization_type = 'Performance' AND date_created < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM call_detail_records WHERE record_id = 1001 AND caller_number = '1234567890';
DELETE FROM network_optimization WHERE optimization_id = 500 AND last_updated <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM network_performance WHERE upload_speed > 100 AND download_speed < 50;
DELETE FROM user_devices WHERE os_version = 'iOS' AND device_name = 'iPhone';
